node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `nodelet` ( `nodelet_id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `nltext` mediumtext, `nlcode` mediumtext, `updateinterval` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `parent_container` int DEFAULT NULL, `lastupdate` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`nodelet_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_0900_ai_ci PACK_KEYS=1
node.title: nodelet
